links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
formula: a(n) = n!*T(n,1), T(n,m) = m/n*sum(k=1..n-m, sum(i=k..n-m, T(n-m,i) * C(i-1,k-1)*(-1)^i)*(-1)^k*C(n+k-1,n-1)), n>m, T(n,n)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 06 2012
maple: A:= proc(n) option remember; local T; if n=0 then 0 else T:= A(n-1); unapply (convert (series (x*(1+T(T(x))), x, n+1), polynom), x) fi end: a:= n-> coeff(A(n)(x), x, n)*n!: seq(a(n), n=1..16); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 23 2008
mathematica: T[n_, m_] := T[n, m] = If[n == m, 1, m/n*Sum[Sum[T[n-m, i]*Binomial[i-1, k-1]*(-1)^i, {i, k, n-m}]*(-1)^k*Binomial[n+k-1, n-1], {k, 1, n-m}]]; Table[n!*T[n, 1], {n, 1, 16}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 12 2014, after _Vladimir Kruchinin_ *)
prog: (Maxima) T(n,m):=if n=m then 1 else m/n*sum(sum(T(n-m,i)*binomial(i-1,k-1)*(-1)^i,i,k,n-m)*(-1)^k*binomial(n+k-1,n-1),k,1,n-m); makelist(n!*T(n,1),n,1,10); \\ _Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 06 2012
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 23 2008
